{"id":470029572,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1616218013,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/470029572/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Encode and Decode TinyURL","memory":"7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    // Encodes a URL to a shortened URL.\n    string encode(string longUrl) {\n        std::string random_str;\n        for(int i = 0; i < 9; i++)\n        {\n            int r = rand() % 3;\n            switch(r)\n            {\n                case 0:\n                    random_str.push_back(rand() % 10 - '0');\n                    break;\n                case 1:\n                    random_str.push_back(rand() % 26 + 65);\n                    break;\n                case 2:\n                    random_str.push_back(rand() % 26 + 97);\n                    break;\n                default:\n                    break;\n            }\n        }\n        std::string encoded = \"http://tinyurl.com/\" + random_str;\n        short_to_long[encoded] = longUrl;\n        return encoded;\n    }\n\n    // Decodes a shortened URL to its original URL.\n    string decode(string shortUrl) {\n        return short_to_long[shortUrl];\n    }\n    std::map<std::string, std::string> short_to_long;\n};\n\n// Your Solution object will be instantiated and called as such:\n// Solution solution;\n// solution.decode(solution.encode(url));","compare_result":"","title_slug":"encode-and-decode-tinyurl","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
